Summary: Went outside to look at the stars and when i turned to observe the moon. A lil ways away from the moon was Mars but...
divs: sighting detailsthere was something that looked like a orange looking sphere that was hovering next to mars. it moved east, then west, then moved in a straight line to where mars is and then moved up in the sky then came back down. i then turned east of the horizon and looked up and right above my house were multiple triangle formations. i brought ny mother and my husband outside so they could see it and one certain triangle had 3 bright points that seem to move slowly with one redish\onge. i went back inside the house because i begfelt paranoid alike someone or something was watching me and after what i saw tonight, i don't believe that we are alone!
